text: [Music]
well ransomware is it's a type of
malware that encrypts your files and
then what happens something pops up on
your screen saying your files have been
locked and you should go get 500 bucks
to somebody's name or whatever in Russia
and unless you do so your files are
encrypted and you're not going to get
the key to unlock them why does that
work because most people don't back up
their stuff so they pay the ransom
because they want to recover the data I
back up my computer on a daily basis so
stop look and think before you click on
a link send me an e-mail or open up an
attachment so you don't fall for the
phishing attack that's going to infect
you in the first place and if you do
fall for it at least you can restore
from your latest backup and you're good
but if you don't have a backup you're
probably stuck
[Music]
